Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package blobfuse2 for versions less than 2.1.0-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package blobfuse2 for versions less than 2.1.0-4. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package blobfuse2 is earlier than 2.1.0-4, affected by CVE-2023-44487
